articles.title: Russia warns of nuclear deployment in Europe amid escalating tensions over Ukraine - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Moscow says it 'does not trust' Nato and is willing to respond to tensions with mid-range missiles
articles.content: Gabrielius Landsbergis, Lithuanias foreign minister, added on Monday ahead of a meeting with her EU counterparts in Brussels: We are convinced that Russia is actually preparing for an all-out war aga… [+885 chars]
